00046 using namespace std;
00047 
00048 bool run = true;
00049 
00050 ros::NodeHandle *n;
00051 KinectRawDepthCam kinectDepthCam;
00052 
00053 sensor_msgs::Image rawDepthImgMsg;
00054 sensor_msgs::Image depthImgMsg;
00055 sensor_msgs::Image rgbImgMsg;
00056 
00057 //ROS publisher
00058 ros::Publisher rgbImagePublisher;
00059 ros::Publisher depthImagePublisher;
00060 ros::Publisher processedDepthImagePublisher;
00061 
00062 //Run modes
00063 bool captureReady = false;
00064 bool runColor = false;
00065 int debugLevel = -1;
00066 
00067 //Device data
00068 int kinectDeviceNumber = 0;
00069 
00070 //Kinect pose
00071 vector3f kinectLoc;
00072 float xRot, yRot, zRot;
00073 
00074 void rgb_cb(freenect_device *dev, freenect_pixel *rgb, uint32_t timestamp);

00076 WatchFiles watch_files;
00077 ConfigReader config("./");
00078 
00079 void LoadParameters()
00080 {
00081   if(!config.readFiles()){
00082     printf("Failed to read config\n");
00083     exit(1);
00084   }
00085   
00086   ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"KinectParameters");
00087   
00088   unsigned int maxDepthVal=1024;
00089   bool error = false;
00090   error = error || !c.getReal("f",kinectDepthCam.f);
00091   error = error || !c.getReal("fovH",kinectDepthCam.fovH);
00092   error = error || !c.getReal("fovV",kinectDepthCam.fovV);
00093   error = error || !c.getInt("width",kinectDepthCam.width);
00094   error = error || !c.getInt("height",kinectDepthCam.height);
00095   error = error || !c.getUInt("maxDepthVal",maxDepthVal);
00096   kinectDepthCam.maxDepthVal = maxDepthVal;
00097   
00098   float xRot, yRot, zRot;
00099   error = error || !c.getVec3f("loc",kinectLoc);
00100   error = error || !c.getReal("xRot",xRot);
00101   error = error || !c.getReal("yRot",yRot);
00102   error = error || !c.getReal("zRot",zRot);
00103   
00104   if(error){
00105     printf("Error Loading Kinect Parameters!\n");
00106     exit(2);
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void InitMsgs()
00111 {
00112   rgbImgMsg.header.seq = 0;
00113   rgbImgMsg.header.frame_id = "kinect";
00114   rgbImgMsg.height = 480;
00115   rgbImgMsg.width = 640;
00116   rgbImgMsg.encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::RGB8;
00117   rgbImgMsg.is_bigendian = 0;
00118   rgbImgMsg.step = 640*3;
00119   rgbImgMsg.data.resize(640*480*3);
00120   
00121   rawDepthImgMsg.header.seq = 0;
00122   rawDepthImgMsg.header.frame_id = "kinect";
00123   rawDepthImgMsg.height = 480;
00124   rawDepthImgMsg.width = 640;
00125   rawDepthImgMsg.encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO16;
00126   rawDepthImgMsg.is_bigendian = 0;
00127   rawDepthImgMsg.step = 640*2;
00128   rawDepthImgMsg.data.resize(640*480*2);
00129   
00130   depthImgMsg.header.seq = 0;
00131   depthImgMsg.header.frame_id = "kinect";
00132   depthImgMsg.height = 480;
00133   depthImgMsg.width = 640;
00134   depthImgMsg.encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8;
00135   depthImgMsg.is_bigendian = 0;
00136   depthImgMsg.step = 640;
00137   depthImgMsg.data.resize(640*480);
00138   
00139 }
00140 
00141 void rgbMsgCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
00142 {
00143   static const bool debug = false;
00144   if(debug) printf("Kinect RGB message received, t=%f\n",msg->header.stamp.toSec());
00145   rgb_cb(NULL, (freenect_pixel*) msg->data.data(), 0);  
00146 }
00147 
00148 void PublishProcessedDepth(freenect_depth *depth)
00149 {
00150   static const double MaxDepth = 4.0;
00151   depthImgMsg.header.seq++;
00152   depthImgMsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00153   double val;
00154   for(int i=0; i<640*480; i++){
00155     val = bound(1.0/(-0.00307110156*double(depth[i])+3.3309495)/MaxDepth,0.0,1.0);
00156     depthImgMsg.data[i] = floor(255.0*val);
00157   }
00158   processedDepthImagePublisher.publish(depthImgMsg);
00159 }
00160 
00161 void depth_cb(freenect_device *dev, freenect_depth *depth, uint32_t timestamp)
00162 { 
00163   if(!captureReady)
00164     return;
00165   
00166   uint8_t* ptrDest = rawDepthImgMsg.data.data();
00167   memcpy(ptrDest, depth, FREENECT_DEPTH_SIZE);
00168   
00169   if(debugLevel>0)
00170     PublishProcessedDepth(depth);
00171   
00172   rawDepthImgMsg.header.seq++;
00173   rawDepthImgMsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00174   depthImagePublisher.publish(rawDepthImgMsg);
00175 }
00176 
00177 void rgb_cb(freenect_device *dev, freenect_pixel *rgb, uint32_t timestamp)
00178 {
00179   if(!captureReady)
00180     return;
00181   
00182   uint8_t* ptrDest = rgbImgMsg.data.data();
00183   memcpy(ptrDest, rgb, FREENECT_RGB_SIZE);
00184   rgbImgMsg.header.seq++;
00185   rgbImgMsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00186   rgbImagePublisher.publish(rgbImgMsg);
00187 }
00188 
00189 int kinect_main()
00190 {
00191   freenect_context *f_ctx;
00192   freenect_device *f_dev;
00193     
00194   if (freenect_init(&f_ctx, NULL) < 0) {
00195     printf("freenect_init() failed\n");
00196     return 1;
00197   }
00198   
00199   int nr_devices = freenect_num_devices (f_ctx);
00200   if(debugLevel>=0) printf ("Number of devices found: %d\n", nr_devices);
00201   
00202   if (nr_devices < 1){
00203     printf("No Kinect connected!\n");
00204     return 1;
00205   }
00206   
00207   if (freenect_open_device(f_ctx, &f_dev, kinectDeviceNumber) < 0) {
00208     printf("Could not open device\n");
00209     return 1;
00210   }
00211   
00212   freenect_set_led(f_dev,LED_GREEN);
00213   freenect_set_depth_callback(f_dev, depth_cb);
00214   
00215   freenect_set_rgb_callback(f_dev, rgb_cb);
00216   freenect_set_rgb_format(f_dev, FREENECT_FORMAT_RGB);
00217   freenect_set_depth_format(f_dev, FREENECT_FORMAT_11_BIT);
00218   
00219   if(debugLevel>=0) printf("Starting depth capture... "); fflush(stdout);
00220   freenect_start_depth(f_dev);
00221   if(debugLevel>=0) printf("Ready.\n"); fflush(stdout);
00222  
00223   
00224   if(runColor){
00225     if(debugLevel>=0) printf("Starting RGB capture... "); fflush(stdout);
00226     freenect_start_rgb(f_dev);
00227     if(debugLevel>=0) printf("Ready.\n"); fflush(stdout);
00228   }
00229   
00230   captureReady = true;
00231   
00232   while(run && freenect_process_events(f_ctx) >= 0 && ros::ok()){
00233     
00234     if(watch_files.getEvents() != 0){
00235       printf("Reloading parameters.\n");
00236       LoadParameters();
00237       watch_files.clearEvents();
00238     }
00239     Sleep(0.01);
00240   }
00241   
00242   //freenect_stop_depth(f_dev);
00243   //freenect_stop_rgb(f_dev);
00244   
00245   if(debugLevel>=0) printf("done!\n");
00246   freenect_set_led(f_dev,LED_BLINK_GREEN);
00247   
00248   return 0;
00249 }
00250 
00251 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00252   
00253   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_WHITE,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00254   printf("\nKinect module\n\n");
00255   ResetTerminal();
00256   
00257   // option table
00258   static struct poptOption options[] = {
00259     { "debug"               , 'd', POPT_ARG_INT   , &debugLevel,         0, "Debug Level"             , "NUM" },
00260     { "device-num"          , 'n', POPT_ARG_INT   , &kinectDeviceNumber ,0, "Kinect device number"    , "NUM" },
00261     { "color"               , 'c', POPT_ARG_NONE  , &runColor           ,0, "Run Color Camera"        , "NONE"},
00262     
00263     POPT_AUTOHELP
00264     { NULL, 0, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL }
00265   };
00266   // parse options
00267   POpt popt(NULL,argc,(const char**)argv,options,0);
00268   int c;
00269   while((c = popt.getNextOpt()) >= 0){
00270   }
00271   
00272   config.init(watch_files);
00273   config.addFile("config/kinect_parameters.cfg");
00274   LoadParameters();
00275   InitMsgs();
00276   
00277   ros::init(argc, argv, "Kinect_Module", ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler);
00278   n = new ros::NodeHandle();
00279   rgbImagePublisher = n->advertise<sensor_msgs::Image>("Kinect/RGB", 1);
00280   depthImagePublisher = n->advertise<sensor_msgs::Image>("Kinect/Depth", 1);
00281   processedDepthImagePublisher = n->advertise<sensor_msgs::Image>("Kinect/ProcessedDepth", 1);
00282   
00283   // main program initialization
00284   InitHandleStop(&run);
00285   
00286   return kinect_main();
00287   
00288   if(debugLevel>=0) printf("Closing.\n");
00289   
00290   return(0);
00291 }
